name: Skyline Assault
description:
Take to the sky and battle it out! Use darts, mines and walls to defeat your opponent. Boost around the screen to dodge their attacks. Level up your attacks by performing them at full power.

Features:

  • 3 Playable Characters each with Unique Attacks.
  • An Arcade mode, VS mode and Target Breaker mode.
  • Local Multi-Player VS mode with Controller Support.
